TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> On 10/3/2016 at 2:12 PM, Rosarium said:
> 
> 
> Third-
> 
> 
> 
> 
> the thread makes all the people who takes (wrongly in my personal opinion) the game too seriously apart (and that's a good thing). Calculations, <abbr title="Mechjeb (mod)">MJ</abbr>, hours of planning, cheats, "amazing projects" are nothing against the real happening of the fun (or the kraken).
> 

Wait, what? I like both. Planning and calculations \*is\* really fun for me.

I don't think there's a wrong way to play. If you're having fun, then its right.

Oh yes. I've had this one saved for the longest time.

![Photo_Nov_30_9_22_34_PM.png](https://s13.postimg.org/nex8yk3nr/Photo_Nov_30_9_22_34_PM.png)

I believe it's Bill. His face sells the shot.

Edit: Forgot I also had this:

![2015_04_27_00012.jpg](https://s22.postimg.org/rq42g4nc1/2015_04_27_00012.jpg)

Don't ask Sebastian K. what happened here, and don't bother asking him how he took down the flagpole without a plane or rocket;

> All hatches are obstructed, can't exit.
> 

HEH, is that from Jean-Paul[K](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Paul_Sartre "Jean-Paul Sartre")erman's *No Exit*?

Playing around with the infiniglide glitch back in 0.24 and getting reentry effects propelled by nothing but control surfaces.

![RvWNKGK.png](http://i.imgur.com/RvWNKGK.png)

A hell of a re-entry

**Edited <time datetime="2018-01-12T00:58:48Z" title="01/12/2018 12:58  AM" data-short="6 yr">January 12, 2018</time> by Wolfair corp.**

My very first orbital docking way back in 0.19. Or rather, attempted docking. That was when I realized the difference between the Clampotron and the Clampotron Jr.  Oops.

[![screenshot4_zps183c438a.png](http://i1342.photobucket.com/albums/o777/LameLefty/Oops%20Moments/screenshot4_zps183c438a.png)](http://s1342.photobucket.com/user/LameLefty/media/Oops%20Moments/screenshot4_zps183c438a.png.html)
